mapper.select: select area, tourism_nm, location_nm_address, parking, tourism_hp from NAMDODB.tourism where sortation like '%관광%'
select area, tourism_nm, location_nm_address, parking, tourism_hp from NAMDODB.tourism where sortation like '%숙박%'
select area, tourism_nm, location_nm_address, parking, tourism_hp from NAMDODB.tourism where sortation like '%먹거리%'
